script.name: plugin.guilds.masscc.menu
script.sourceplaintext:
$pageid = get global variable: name='pageid.guilds' $DATA = get global variable: name='cmd.data'
if $a.event == [MEvent.Start] $DATA = table alloc gosub sub.FillData set global variable: name='cmd.data' value=$DATA gosub sub.BuildMenu return $input
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Switch] $menu.id = $a.data[0] $selection = $a.data[1] $value = $a.data[2] $current.tab = $DATA[$menu.id] $DATA[$selection] = $value
if $menu.id == 'guilds.masscc' gosub sub.BuildMenu return $menu end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.TabChanged] $menu.id = $a.data[0] $selection = $a.data[1] $DATA[$menu.id] = $selection gosub sub.BuildMenu return $menu
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Search] $menu.id = $a.data[0] $selection = $a.data[1] $DATA['search'] = $selection gosub sub.BuildMenu return $menu
else if $a.event == [MEvent.HeadingClick] $menu.id = $a.data[0] $selection = $a.data[1] $value = $a.data[2] if $selection == 'main.heading' if $value <= 280 $sort = 'name' else if $value <= 430 $sort = 'sector' else $sort = 'cmd' end $tmp = $DATA['sort'] if $tmp == $sort if $DATA['sort.invert'] $DATA['sort.invert'] = [FALSE] else $DATA['sort.invert'] = [TRUE] end else $DATA['sort.invert'] = [FALSE] end $DATA['sort'] = $sort gosub sub.BuildMenu return $menu end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Select]
$table.available = $DATA['avail'] $table.selected = $DATA['select']
$menu.id = $a.data[0] $selection = $a.data[1] $current.tab = $DATA[$menu.id]
if $selection == 'open.cc' $input = create input: id='commandconsole' open command console menu, list=$table.selected return $input
else if $selection == 'select.all' $table.filtered = $DATA['filtered.avail'] if $table.filtered $ship = get next key: table=$table.filtered key=null while $ship $table.selected[$ship] = [TRUE] remove key $ship from table $table.available $ship = get next key: table=$table.filtered key=$ship end end
else if $selection == 'deselect' $table.filtered = $DATA['filtered.select'] if $table.filtered $ship = get next key: table=$table.filtered key=null while $ship $table.available[$ship] = [TRUE] remove key $ship from table $table.selected $ship = get next key: table=$table.filtered key=$ship end end else
if $selection -> is of class Ship if $table.available[$selection] $table.selected[$selection] = [TRUE] remove key $selection from table $table.available else if $table.selected[$selection] $table.available[$selection] = [TRUE] remove key $selection from table $table.selected end end end
gosub sub.BuildMenu $input = create input return value: update menu=$menu return $input end
return null
sub.FillData: $table.selected = table alloc $DATA['select'] = $table.selected
$array = get ship array: of race Player class/type=Ship $table.available = convert array to table: $array, increment=[FALSE] $DATA['guilds.masscc'] = 0 $DATA['avail'] = $table.available $DATA['inc.def'] = [TRUE] $DATA['inc.ships'] = [TRUE] $DATA['inc.beacon'] = [TRUE] $DATA['inc.sats'] = [TRUE] $DATA['sort'] = 'name' $DATA['sort.invert'] = [FALSE] endsub
sub.BuildMenu: $menu = create custom menu array
$current.tab = $DATA['guilds.masscc'] $table.available = $DATA['avail'] $table.selected = $DATA['select']
$read.text = read text: page=$pageid id=4101 $text = size of table $table.available $text = convert number $text to string $text = sprintf: fmt='%s (%s)', $read.text, $text, null, null, null add tab to menu: $menu, text=$text
$read.text = read text: page=$pageid id=4114 $ret = create menu return value: callback, value='select.all' add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text returnvalue=$ret
$table.filtered = table alloc $table = $table.available gosub sub.DisplayShips $DATA['filtered.avail'] = $table.filtered
$read.text = read text: page=$pageid id=4102 $text = size of table $table.selected $text = convert number $text to string $text = sprintf: fmt='%s (%s)', $read.text, $text, null, null, null add tab to menu: $menu, text=$text
if size of table $table.selected $ret = create menu return value: callback, value='open.cc' $colour = [MenuColour.Green] else $ret = create menu return value: disabled, id='open.cc' $colour = [MenuColour.Disabled] end $read.text = read text: page=$pageid id=4113 $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=0 right=[FALSE] colour=$colour text=$read.text add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text returnvalue=$ret
add section to custom menu: $menu $read.text = read text: page=$pageid id=4115 $ret = create menu return value: callback, value='deselect' add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text returnvalue=$ret
$table.filtered = table alloc $table = $table.selected gosub sub.DisplayShips $DATA['filtered.select'] = $table.filtered
$read.text = read text: page=$pageid id=4103 add tab to menu: $menu, text=$read.text
$read.text = read text: page=$pageid id=4107 $id = 'inc.ships' gosub sub.AddYesNo
$read.text = read text: page=$pageid id=4105 $id = 'inc.sats' gosub sub.AddYesNo
$read.text = read text: page=$pageid id=4104 $id = 'inc.def' gosub sub.AddYesNo
$read.text = read text: page=$pageid id=4106 $id = 'inc.beacon' gosub sub.AddYesNo
set menu option: $menu, icon=40 set menu option: $menu, widthtype=[MenuWidth.Big] set menu option: $menu, remove main header=[TRUE] set menu option: $menu, allow searching=[TRUE]
$read.text = read text: page=$pageid id=4100 $flags = [Callback.TabChanged] | [Callback.Switch] $input = create input: id='guilds.masscc' menu=$menu title=$read.text description=[PLAYERSHIP] callback=$flags endsub
sub.AddYesNo: $aValues = create new array, arguments=[Text.No], [Text.Yes], null, null, null $default = $DATA[$id] skip if $default $default = 0 add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$read.text, value array=$aValues, default=$default, return id=$id, width=100 allowtabs=[TRUE] endsub
sub.DisplayShips: $drawn = 0
$text.cols = array alloc: size=3 $read.text = read text: page=$pageid id=4110 $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=220 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.cols[0] = $text $read.text = read text: page=$pageid id=4111 $text = create custom menu column string, position=280 length=150 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.cols[1] = $text $read.text = read text: page=$pageid id=4112 $text = create custom menu column string, position=430 length=0 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.cols[2] = $text add clickable heading: menu=$menu, text=$text.cols, id='main.heading', allow empty=[FALSE]
if $table $sort = $DATA['sort'] $search = $DATA['search'] $sort.table = table alloc $ship = get next key: table=$table key=null while $ship if $search $text = $ship -> get name if not case insensitive string match, is $search in $text $ship = get next key: table=$table key=$ship continue end end
if $sort == 'name' $text = $ship -> get name else if $sort == 'sector' $text = $ship -> get sector else if $sort == 'cmd' $text = $ship ->get command display override if not $text $text = $ship -> get command $text = get command name: command=$text end else $text = $ship -> get name end
$sort.table[$ship] = $text $ship = get next key: table=$table key=$ship end
$sorted.array = sort table keys by value: table=$sort.table do if $DATA['sort.invert'] $sorted.array = reverse array $sorted.array
$ship.i = 0 $ship.max = size of array $sorted.array while $ship.i < $ship.max $ship = $sorted.array[$ship.i] inc $ship.i =
if $ship -> is of class Beacon skip if $DATA['inc.beacon'] continue else if $ship -> is of class Jump Beacon skip if $DATA['inc.beacon'] continue else if $ship -> is of class All Satellites skip if $DATA['inc.sats'] continue else if $ship -> is of class Lasertower skip if $DATA['inc.def'] continue else $speed = $ship -> get current max speed if not $speed skip if $DATA['inc.def'] continue else skip if $DATA['inc.ships'] continue end end
$table.filtered[$ship] = [TRUE] gosub sub.DisplayShip inc $drawn = end end
if not $drawn $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=689 add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$read.text end endsub
sub.DisplayShip:
$text.cols = array alloc: size=5 $text = $ship ->create custom menu string object icon $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=15 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[0] = $text $text = $ship -> get name $text = create custom menu column string, position=10 length=205 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[1] = $text $text = $ship -> get ID code $text = create custom menu column string, position=215 length=60 right=[TRUE] colour=[MenuColour.Grey] text=$text $text.cols[2] = $text $sector = $ship -> get sector $text = $sector -> get name $text = create custom menu column string, position=280 length=150 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[3] = $text $text = $ship ->get command display override if not $text $text = $ship -> get command $text = get command name: command=$text end $text = create custom menu column string, position=430 length=0 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[4] = $text
$ret = create menu return value: callback, value=$ship add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text.cols returnvalue=$ret endsub
return null

create menu return value: callback, value=
add custom menu item to array

create menu return value: disabled, id=
create custom menu column string, position=

create custom menu column string, position=
